entry.title: [RBX/BHS][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 07:00 - 16:00 UTC

Apr 2, 04:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 16/04/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts..

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host incident notification
entry.content:
Apr 5, 14:23 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on Hosted Private Cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 05/04/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 05/04/2025 14:01 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 5, 11:46 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 05/04/2025 11:30 UTC
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][HostedPrivateCloud] - R806L23 Incident notification.
entry.content:
Mar 23, 00:03 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our storage offer on the specific rack R806L23. has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 22/03/2025 21:45 UTC
End time : 22/03/2025 23:00 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 22, 23:47 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Start time : 22/03/2025 21:45 UTC

Mar 22, 23:46 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Start time : 22/03/2025 21:45 UTC

Mar 22, 22:39 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our storage offer on the specific rack R806L23.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 22/03/2025 21:45 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some users cannot access their servers in the specific rack R806L23 in RBX8 region.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 22, 22:31 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Hosted Private Cloud offer in the rack R806L23.

Start time : 22/03/2025 21:45 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX1a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
entry.content:
Mar 12, 15:23 UTC
Resolved - We were experiencing an incident affecting our storage offering, which was causing temporary availability issues on the specific region RBX1a.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/03/2025 20:38 UTC
End time: 07/03/2025 20:43 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some datastores were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some datastores were temporarily inaccessible, the datastores hosted were also unavailable in RBX1a region.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
